text:
Opening Question

1. Go into "My Work" in the tabs above and pull up your stakeholder map.

2. Re-read your stakeholder map.

3. What should be our next step if we want to help some of these stakeholders to conserve water? Write your answer in the box below.

4. (If time) note any wonderings you have about how to meet stakeholder need in the same box.
What should be our next step if we want to help some of these stakeholders to conserve water?
